statements: UPDATE BillingAndPayments SET amount = 100.50, payment_date = '2022-02-15 10:00:00' WHERE billing_id = 1;

UPDATE payment SET payment_method = 'Credit Card', amount = 150.75 WHERE customer_id = 500
UPDATE billing SET amount = amount + 1000.50, date = '2022-09-15' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE payment SET payment_method = 'Credit Card', amount = amount * 1.2 WHERE customer_id = 10;

UPDATE products SET product_price = 29.99, product_description = 'New updated description' WHERE product_id = 3;
